channel.title: Half Life 2 Orange Box problem
channel.description:
Hello. I have problem w with HL2.
I'm in chapter 1, when I want to go through the doors after I went by ladder at square and passed next to two men which were spoke about OC raid on homes.
Before the doors there are 2 OC standing at doors (when you look on them the doors I'm talking about are by left side). I enter this room (hallway) and near doors are. After opening there schould be a LOADING. But my game just crash to MAIN MENU to selecting chapter window....
In simple words - game crashed to main menu when LOADING.
I don't know what to do, no idea what's the reason of that.
EDIT:
Ok, I fixed it myself. As always<3 I'm just loving it to solve problems.
Cheers.
And sorry for my english, it's not my main language.

item.title: Half Life 2 Orange Box problem
